external_games.name: Dragon Master Silk - Ryuu Shoukan Musume: Episode II

name: Dragon Master Silk: Ryuu Shoukan Musume Episode II
summary: Dragon Master Silk: Ryuu Shoukan Musume Episode II is an erotic RPG dungeon crawling game. The subtitle says "Episode 2," but there is no "Episode 1" in this series. This game is the first original in the series.
